card.text: Surveil 2. Create a 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature token with flying for each card you put into your graveyard this way, then draw a card for each card you kept on top. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Commune With Evil
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Scorched Desolation
card.text: Choose one — • Scorched Desolation deals 2 damage to any target. • Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Despondent Colonists
card.text: You may strain this creature as it attacks. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then up to one other target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn where X is the number of counters on this creature. (To strain, tap it then put a stun counter on it.)

card.name: Artificial Warfront
card.text: Create three 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens.

card.name: Cuphro Invasion
card.text: Whenever you attack, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card. Then if you control a creature with power 7 or greater, each creature you control you control can't be blocked by more than one creature until end of turn.

card.name: Orbital Drop Troopers
card.text: Flash This creatures has flying if it hasn't dealt damage yet. When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

card.name: Consider the Cosmos

card.name: Lunar Archfiend

(Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.) Whenever a creature card enters your graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, you may pay life equal to its mana value. When you do, return that card to your hand.

card.name: Agent of Retribution
card.text: Trample At the beginning of combat on your turn, this creature gets +1/+0 for each tapped creature you control.

card.name: Enticing Discovery
card.text: Surveil 3, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If you reveal a land card this way, put it on the battlefield tapped, if you reveal a creature card this way, put it into your hand, otherwise put the card back on top of your library. (To surveil 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Unearthly Encounter
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card. If you're desperate, instead search your library for a creature or land card. Reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (You're desperate if you've discarded a card, lost 3 or more life, or a nonland permanent died under your control this turn.)

card.name: Mutagen Spreader
card.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, experiment on up to one target creature that hasn't been experimented on this turn. (Add or remove a +1/+1 counter or a type of counter already on the target.) When you experiment on a creature you control, it gains flying and vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Orchestrator of Wills
card.text: If you would draw a card, instead surveil 1 then draw a card. (To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from your hand, library, or from exile, you may pay {2}. If you do, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Bravo-2, Ruthless Commando
card.text: Whenever you attack, creatures you control with power greater than their base power gain menace until end of turn. At the beginning of your end step, if you've attacked this turn, create a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with "{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery."

card.name: Emberwing Emissary
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 2 damage to each of up to three targets. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Path Treading Tank

card.text: Destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater. Create a Specimen token for each creature that was destroyed this way. card.name: Into the Pit

card.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. You may strain it. If you do, strain this creature. (To strain, tap it then put a stun counter on it.)

card.name: Awoken Warframe
card.text: This creature attacks each combat if able. This creature enters with four +1/+1 counters. When it dies, distribute its +1/+1 counters among creatures you control. {W}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Activate as a sorcery.

card.name: Augmented-Reality Visor
City Outbreak
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice one or more creatures. When you do, copy this spell for each creature sacrificed this way. Each opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Operative Reactivation
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control and strain it." (To strain, tap it then put a stun counter on it.)

card.name: Skyline Enforcer
card.text: Flying Whenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Hive Queen
card.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Whenever you attack, you may sacrifice a creature or discard a card. If you do, draw a card and this creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Infernal Ravager
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever this creature attacks, if you're desperate, it deals 1 damage to target player and each creature that player controls. (You're desperate if you've discarded a card, lost 3 or more life, or a nonland permanent died under your control this turn.)

card.name: Lab Infiltration
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gains haste and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Specimen token." (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Experiment on target permanent you control. Activate only as a sorcery." To experiment, add or remove a +1/+1 counter or a type of counter already on the target.)

card.name: Forged Recluse
card.text: Defender, reach Whenever you surveil, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. As long as this creature has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Cunning Tactics
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You may strain that creature. When you do, it gains trample, hexproof, and indestructible until end of turn. (To strain, tap it then put a stun counter on it.)

card.name: Ancient Awakening
card.text: Surveil 2, then return a creature card and a land card from your graveyard to your hand. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Astral Strategist
card.text: You may strain this creature as it attacks. When you do, it can't be blocked this turn and you surveil 1. (To strain, tap it then put a stun counter on it. To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Multi-Point Waygate
card.text: {2}, {T}: Exile target creature you control. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Return each creature card exiled with this artifact to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Ensnaring Matrix
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a charge counter on this artifact. {5}, {T}: Draw a card. This ability costs {1} less for each charge counter on this artifact.

card.name: Maxine, Cynical Renegade
card.text: [+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls enters, strain it. (To strain, tap it then put a stun counter on it.) [-1]: Draw a card. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."

card.name: Plithium-Plated Mech
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Double strike, vigilance, trample This creature enters with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

card.name: Feasting Skittermaw
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control for each player that is desperate. (You're desperate if you've discarded a card, lost 3 or more life, or a nonland permanent died under your control this turn.) Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, if it had counters on it, put those counters on this creature.

card.name: Keilan, Rabble-Rouser
card.text: Haste You may strain Keilan as she attacks. (To strain, tap it then put a stun counter on it.) Whenever you strain a creature you control, add {R}{G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

card.name: Sterile Synthesis
card.text: You may exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard as you cast this spell. It costs {1} less to cast for each card exiled this way. Search your library for up to two creature cards, each with mana value 3 or less. Reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield, put the other into your hand, and then shuffle.

card.name: Malignant Venomwing
card.text: Flying, deathtouch Whenever you attack, experiment on each attacking creature. For each counter you remove this way, create a 1/1 black Parasite creature token with "This creature can't block." (Add or remove a +1/+1 counter or a type of counter already on the target.)

card.name: Seed of Infection
card.text: Vigilance, lifelink Creature tokens you control get +1/+1. Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 black Parasite creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Evelyn, Battle Calculatrix
card.text: Noncreature spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Evelyn and draw a card.

card.name: Dread Reaper
card.text: Assimilate {5}{B}{G} (You may cast this spell from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature and paying the assimilate cost reduced by that creature's mana value. It enters with a finality counter.) Whenever a player is dealt combat damage, they mill that many cards. For each creature card put into a graveyard this way, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Blitzwing Striker
card.text: Flying, haste Other artifact creatures you control have haste. Whenever this creature attacks, it deals damage equal to the number of attacking artifact creatures you control to target opponent.

card.name: Eldritch Haruspex
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) Once each turn, you may put a land card from among cards you are looking at while surveiling onto the battlefield.

card.name: Fluxreactor Manticore
card.text: Menace, haste Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Then this creature deals damage equal to the number of counters on it to each opponent. You gain that much life.

card.name: Relentless Raid
card.text: Untap all creatures you control. If it's your combat phase, there is an additional main phase after this phase followed by an additional combat phase. Create X 1/1 red Mercenary creature tokens with "{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery." They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Maxine, Cynical Renegade OPZ
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards.

card.name: Horror OPZ
card.text: Hexproof

card.name: Charim Kosta, Hullraider
card.text: [+1]: Up to one target creature gains menace, haste, and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of that player's library and put a contraband counter on each." [-X]: You may cast a nonland card an opponent owns in exile with mana value X and a contraband counter on it without paying its mana cost. [-X]:

card.name: D'Emil, Apex Hunter
card.text: Vigilance, reach, trample, haste When D'Emil enters, create two 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature tokens with flying. At the beginning of your end step, if an attacking creature died this turn, draw a card and put two +1/+1 counters on D'Emil.

card.name: Moira, Rapid Adapter
card.text: Creatures you control dying causes their triggered abilities to trigger as though they had entered.

card.name: Nanotech Pilferer
card.text: Flash You may have this creature enter as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact creature in addition to its other types, it has flying, and it's X/X where X is the mana value of the copied permanent.
